description: Query a list of Resource Records of a specific DNS Zone
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: DNSZONE to query the list of records out of
Use a pattern to search records, e.g. '@ IN NS ...'
Return only records of a submitted type, e.g. NS or A
Switch to EXTENDED mode to return forwardings
Shorten output of records, e.g. parent zone removed from subdomains
